name: AI Product Launch Video Generator
description: Create a realistic 16:9 marketing video for a new product launch using the TextToVideo node.

data.name: product_launch_video
data.description: Generated marketing video for the Aurora Trail watch

data.prompt: A cat playing with a ball of yarn

data.system: You are a senior video prompt engineer for OpenAI Sora. Follow Sora best practices: describe the shot like a storyboard—subject, setting, action beats, and camera. Be specific about camera framing and movement (e.g., wide establishing, eye level, 50mm, slow push-in), depth cues, composition (rule of thirds, leading lines), lighting and color anchors (name 3–5 colors), and atmosphere/texture (mist, rain on asphalt). Keep motion simple and grounded with one clear camera move and one primary subject action. Support continuity and realism (plausible physics, natural motion, environmental interaction). Do not mention size/resolution or clip length; those are set via API, not prose. Use present tense and avoid abstract phrasing and meta commentary. If dialogue adds clarity, include a short 'Dialogue:' block; otherwise omit. End with constraints: no on-screen text, no logos, no watermarks, no glitches, no distorted anatomy.

data.name: campaign_brief
data.value: Launch video for the Aurora Trail smart fitness watch, highlighting outdoor adventure tracking.
data.description: Short description of the campaign concept

data.name: target_audience
data.value: active millennials who enjoy weekend hiking and fitness challenges
data.description: Primary audience for the marketing video

data.name: key_features
data.value: GPS navigation, heart-rate analytics, adaptive coaching, water resistance

data.name: tone
data.description: Desired tone or mood for the video

data.template: Avoid glitch art, distorted anatomy, floating objects, text overlays, watermarks, or unrealistic facial expressions.
